39542377.review:
Devs words: "Slay the Spire currently has loads of content and lots of polish."
It took me 3 hours to complete the game and get to the credits, same goes for other revieweers. For £10 this game is not worth it in it's current state, however it is still addicting while you havn't beaten the game. 

Cons:
-Few decisions; the paths have the same amount of elite mobs and camp fires, if you are low on HP you should be able to decide wether you want more camp fires or if you are high on HP you should be able to fight more elite mobs.
-Elite mobs are the same on each floor; there is only 2 kind of elite mobs on each floor.
-Few floors; there is fucking 3 floors in the whole game before you complete it.(??!?!?!?!?)
-Replayability; after the first clear it seems pretty pointless. Sure you could discover all the relics but what's the point?
-Interactions; some interactions are just straight up frustrating, for example draw 3 cards after you have first taken damage, if you take damage at the end of your turn you lose those 3 cards.
-AI; the AI is really predictable, switching between attacks and their powers.
-Easy; the difficulty of this game is too easy, if it takes 3hours to beat then you know that you have done something wrong.
-Music; especially the one in the main menu began to grate on me after one hour. 

Pros:
+Decision making; when it comes to your cards, you can either skip a card or get a new card. Some of the relics are really fun also.
+Bosses; the bosses are unique and fun to play against.
+[?]; these are the most fun part of the game, the randomness you can get from some of these will change how you play your run.

Just some additional text, this game needs a infinite floor mechanic and what paths you take should matter.
The colors on the second character is hard on the eyes, looks disgusting however the second character was the most fun in my opinion with the draw-discard mechanic.
Also, for some reason the sensitivity changes in the game window while on fullscreen borderless but there is no option to change your mouse speed.

All in all, I would probably buy this game when it is out of early access but right now I wouldn't even recommend it to a friend.

39537609.review:
A great deck builder card game and branching dungeon crawl RPG combined.

Does more that a cardboard version could, and yet feels very much like a solid addition to my board game deck building collection (alongside games like Dominion, Legendary and even the newer Hogwarts Battle).

If I were to nitpick I'd say the Warlock character seems better than the Warrior character due to the huge 'draw and extra 2 cards' relic. I seem to always progress much further with him. And the art style is a little basic, yet functional.

A really addictive game that could greatly benefit with another character or two and some variation in the map and/or cards.

Fans of board games and card games alike should get more than their money's worth. It's a bit of a gem.

Monster Slayers is better. Imagine playing blackjack at a rigged casino and the dealer takes your physical cues the wrong way sometimes. 


RNG steals the show with player skill tied up in the back trying to escape.


The UI is frustrating. I have accidently not taking awesome items sometimes, ruining my runs, because the UI is so absurdly designed. Skip pick up button is on the right and in the natural position you would click to continue but no you have to make sure to click on every item so naturally you read the item and click what you think is continue causing you to lose anything you haven’t clicked on; even when you know better it just gets you to click it. 

Can’t even drag the screen down  to look at cards during a deck prompt because releasing the mouse triggers clicked on card no matter how long you held it down and dragged. 

During battle I feel like I'm fighting with the UI to drag and drop cards.


The start of the game is seriously flawed. It’s always the same so ridiculously boring and you know if you lost before you even get to the end of the first round based on what you were able to obtain but you can’t abandoned because then you will receive no bonus at the start of next round; I think just to rub it in your face.


They make it sound like allot of cards but really there isn’t. You have one or maybe two sets of combos you can set up to win the game. If you don’t catch them and some good relics to go with them you lost.


It can be a fun time waster but the game plays you not the other way around and the starting over is mind numbing due to them being 99% similar. I’d skip it for anything over five dollars.

39534129.review:
Ich kann Slay the Spire jedem entfehlen der ein Game für zwischendurch sucht. Das beste am Spiel ist das alles was im Spiel vor sicht geht auf dem Zufall berüht, somit ist es jedes mal eine andere Erfahrung. Teilweise hat man Glück und man kommt einfach bis am Schluss, teilweise stirbt man schon vor dem ersten Boss. Stehst du auf Rage-inducing games wie z.B. Cuphead oder Bloodborn dann ist dies genau das richtige für dich. Auch das Preis-Leistung-Verhältnis ist Top weil man mit diesem Spiel immer wieder ein paar Stunden sich beschäftigen kann. Auch die Aktivität der Entwickler ist Top, da man jederzeit Feedback geben kann, und alle Spiele aufgezeichnet werden, was dann für das Balancing benutzt wird.

Fazit: Bestes Early-Access Spiel seit langem, da schon ein soldies Grundspiel  da ist, mit doch schon 2 verschiedenen spielbaren Charaktern und wöchentlichen Updates.

39533791.review:
플레이타임 18시간만에 아이언클래드와 사일런트 클리어를했다. 

아이언클래드는 전사느낌의 캐릭터고 사일런트는 암살자느낌의 직업인데
아이언클래드는 버프를 통해 한방에 뚝배기를 깨버릴 수 있고
사일런트는 독이나 덱의 빠른 순환을통해 이끌어나가는 재미가 있다.

던전의 구성은 총 3단계이고, 각 층은 몬스터방 엘리트방 미지의방 상인방 상자방 휴식방 보스방이 있다.  한 단계에 약 15개의 층을 건너 보스를 처치하면 다음 단계로 넘어가게 된다.

어떤 카드를 선택하고 어떤 유물을 획득하게 되느냐에 따라 난이도가 천차만별이다. 첫번째층은 생각없이 골라도 넘어갈 수 있지만 두번째층부터는 덱의 완성도, 유물의 종류에 따라 어려워지기 시작한다. 유물파밍을 위해 엘리트방에 갔다가 체력유지가 안되서 죽을때도 많이 있다.  휴식방이 적절히 배치된 루트나 미지방을 노리면서 가는것도 좋은 선택이 될 수 있다. 

한회차가 끝날때마다 경험치가 쌓이고 카드를 해금하게 되는데 해금이 다 안되있어도 클리어가 가능하다. 한 직업에 해금 가능한 횟수는 4회로 한번에 3장씩 열리는 것 같다. 아이언클래드는 한번, 사일런트는 두번 해금을했는데 해금을 할수록 카드총수가늘어나 정작 컨셉에 필요한 중요카드를 얻기 힘들것 같다는 느낌이 든다. 해금카드가 막 좋은건 아닌것 같기 때문이다. 

11일자로 한글패치가 나왔다. 영어는 미지방에서나 가끔 보이는정도로 선택지는 한글로 번역이 다 되있기 때문에 게임을 진행하는 필수적인 요소는 한글로 모두 확인이 가능하다. 얼리어세스답게 업데이트도 꽤나 빠르게 이루어져서 밸런싱도 점점 좋아지는중. 플레이마다 덱의 컨셉이 많이 바뀌므로 매판이 새로운 재미가 있다.

팁을 주자면

1.초반에 주는 카드를 빠르게 떨구면서 키카드를 찾는것이 중요한데, 덱이 모두 소모가되면 다시 뽑을 수 있으므로 좋아보인다고 막넣기보다는 컨셉을 생각해가면서 신중하게 추가해야 한다. 예를들어 사일런트를 플레이할때, 빠른 덱순환을 컨셉으로 가고있는데 보스를 잡고 뜬 전설카드가 모두 독과 관련되있는 컨셉이면 그냥 건너가는게 더 좋을 수도있다.

2.에너지를 주는것들은 패널티가 많이심하지않으면 집고가는것이 좋다. 기본적으로 턴마다 손패는 5장이들어오는데, 기본 3의 에너지를 다 사용하면 한두장정도 남게된다. 따라서 드로우가 부족하다면 에너지를 펌핑해주는 카드,유물이 효율이 더욱 좋게된다.

3.후반으로 가면 내최대체력이 70인데 적이 한턴에 30딜씩 꽂아넣는 상황도 꽤나 자주 나오게 된다. 따라서 디버프 카드와 방어카드의 비율을 전체덱의 60퍼센트 이상 두는것이 좋다. 방어카드만 집다가는 힘버프를 하는 몬스터를만나 탈탈 털릴수도 있기때문.

4.고래에게 삥뜯을때는 최대체력이나 기본유물을 보스유물로 바꾸는것은 효율이 좋지 않다. 개인적으로 최고의 선택지는 유물하나 공짜로 얻는것.차선은 카드한장 변환이나 삭제다. 카드변환은 기본카드를 삭제하면서 컨셉을 초반에 정할수 있게 해주므로 꽤나 좋은 선택지이다.

정말 휴대폰으로도 하고싶은 게임인데, 아쉽게도 정식 출시후에 휴대폰으로 옮기는 작업을 시작한다고 한다.

39533035.review:
Slay the Spire ist ein Spiel, das man schlecht einordnen kann. Man kämpft sich in bisher 3 Leveln durch Räume in denen Gegner, Elitegegner, Schatztruhen, Händler oder zufällige Events sein können. Auf der Übersichtskarte sieht man einen Großteil der Räume schon insofern, als dass man weiß, was einen erwartet.

Das Kampfsystem ist rundenbasiert und man spielt Karten aus, die entweder Schaden machen, Schaden vom Gegner blocken oder Fähigkeiten auslösen. Dabei bekommt man nach jedem geschafften Raum eine neue Karte für sein Deck und Gold und manchmal auch Tränke. 

Zusätzlich zu den Karten gibt es noch Relikte, die in Truhe, von Elitegegnern oder bei Events auftauchen können. Auch bei den Bossen am Ende jedes Levels gibt es ein Relikt zur Belohnung.

Das Spiel macht unglaublich viel Spaß und, leider, auch süchtig. Momentan sind 2 Charaktere verfügbar, die jeweils ein eigenes Kartenset haben. Die Decks, die man sich im Laufe eines Durchlaufs erspielt und zusammen baut sind jedes Mal wieder anders und man sollte versuchen, Synergien zwischen den verschiedenen Karten zu erlangen.

Ich kann die Early Access Version durchaus empfehlen, bei mir traten keine Bugs oder Abstürze auf. Die deutsche Übersetzung ist an einigen Stellen minimal holprig, aber darüber kann man hinweg sehen, man versteht so gut wie alles und kommt zurecht.

39612008.review:
I just want to say this first... I stayed home from work the other day due to icy conditions. Instead of doing work like I should have... I may have spent most of that time playing this game even after I reviewed it. That should immediately let you know this is gonna be a positive review. However, there is some balance that may need to take place.

I got lucky on my first run... I actually made it to the top of the sppire, since that time... I've been crushed on the 2nd floor. Outside of that, this game is a sort of CCG Rogue-like that has random enemies and encouters on each floor. You collect relics and cards to build up your "hero" to be able to take on multiple... unforgiving enemies. There are several ways to build each character, but some of the cards seem like they need some work. Either in changing the way they are upgraded, the wording, or the damage/interaction they have.

Overall though. There is tons of playability with the multiple classes and deck builds. CCG fans will love collecting and building the decks while the Rogue-like crowd will love the repeated failures and miniscule triumphs.

39611795.review: Fun card game/roguelite with lots of replayability - value for money.

39611755.review:
Fun and addictive game. On the first look it might seem like the game is quite shallow, so I was a bit skeptical about it, however I decided to give it a go and it turned out there is loads of content, and as it's still early access, so there will be even more content. Each character can have so many different builds, and they don't just depend on the cards, but also on the relics you pick up. Your deck can change entirely half way through the run, which makes it more fun. The encounters you find can offer you some challenging to make choices, potentially make your run better, or lead you to complete death.

Also this is a good kind of early access, no half released game filled with issues, just more and more content in a game already filled with plenty of it. Another positive is music, there is some nice soundtrack in the game, however it can get quite repetitive, so hoping for more great compositions in the future.

I strongly recommend this game, even if you are not a fan of card games, give it a go, rouge-likes elements of the game are a great addition and make the game so much more than just a game of cards. It's a great time consumer as well.
